court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN LP 25/2015 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS ,VAIKOM CRIME NO.311/2003 OF Vaikom Police Station , Kottayam PETITIONER/ACCUSED : MANICHAN @ IMMANUEL, AGED 55 YEARS S/O GEORGE, RESIDING
full_text: Dear) Be Sener PEERS Beer 2020/KER/175 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON MONDAY, THE O6TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 16TH POUSHA, 1941 Cri .MC.No.8553 OF 2019 (H) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN LP 25/2015 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS ,VAIKOM CRIME NO.311/2003 OF Vaikom Police Station , Kottayam PETITIONER/ACCUSED : MANICHAN @ IMMANUEL, AGED 55 YEARS S/O GEORGE, RESIDING AT UPPANIYIL VEEDU, NEAR MARSLEEBA SCHOOL, KIZHAKKEKARA, VADAYAR VILLAGE, VAIKOM, KOTTAYAM DISTRICT-686 605. BY ADV. SRI.S.SREEKUMAR (KOLLAM) RESPONDENTS/STATE/DEFACTO COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY GOVERNMENT PLEADER, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, HERNAKULAM 2 JOSE S/O JOHN, RESIDING AT MANAGALATH VEEDU, THALAYOLAPARAMBU, VADAYAR VILLAGE, VAIKOM, KOTTAYAM DISTRICT-686 605. R2 BY ADV. R.RAJESH (PULLIKADA) C.S.HRITHWIK-SR.PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 06.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: eee 2020/KER/175 Crl1.MC.No.8553 OF 2019 (H) 2 ORDER Dated this the 6th day of January 2020 The petitioner is the sole accused in Crime No.311/2003 of Vaikom Police Station, he was absconding and a case against him is presently pending as LP No.25/2015 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Vaikom, for having allegedly committed offence punishable under Section 409 of the IPC. 2. The defacto complainant is the 2 respondent, who has appeared through counsel and filed an affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioner and that he has no grievance against him. A report has been called for from the Investigating Officer through the senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioner does not have any criminal antecedents. The matter has been fully and finally settled. There is a civil dispute Beal Bie anny pe 2020/KER/175 Crl1.MC.No.8553 OF 2019 (H) 3 which also had been disposed of. In the result, the Crl.M.C is allowed and the entire proceedings in Crime No.311/2003 of Vaikom Police Station, presently pending as LP No.25/2015 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Vaikom, stands quashed under Section 482 of the Cr.P.C and the accused is discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE SPK Bie Bl Be Sener FEE Bobo | 2020/KER/175 Cr1.MC.No.8553 OF 2019 (H) 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al THE CERTIFICATE COPY OF FIR NO 311/03 OF VAIKOM POLICE STATION ANNEXURE A2 THE CERTIFICATE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT AND CONNECTED DOCUMENTS IN CRIME NO 311/03 OF VAIKOM POLICE STATION ANNEXURE A3 AFFIDAVIT RESPONDENT'S/S EXHIBITS: NIL /TRUE COPY/ PA TO JUDGE
